original_title: Police Sergeant Killed, Sub-Inspector Injured in Weligama Shooting
original_body_lines: A shooting early this morning in Palena, Weligama has left a police sergeant dead and a sub-inspector injured.
The attack unfolded as a nine-officer unit responded to a tip-off and conducted a raid, only to be met with gunfire.
According to police reports, the group of officers came under unexpected fire upon entering the targeted location.
A sergeant from the Dematagoda Police Special Crime Investigation Division tragically succumbed to his injuries.
His colleague, a sub-inspector, sustained injuries and is currently receiving medical attention at Karapitiya Teaching Hospital.
Senior DIG in charge of the Southern Province has initiated a special investigation to probe the incident and bring the perpetrators to justice.
